document.full_text: black lung disease, long a killer of coal miners, is on the rise again after retreating in the 30 years since congress passed tougher mine safety laws, health and safety experts said on friday.
document.title: black lung disease seen rising in u.s. miners
lines_and_colors: black lung disease, long a killer of coal miners, is on the rise again after retreating in the 30 years since congress passed tougher mine safety laws, health and safety experts said on friday.
